analysis.description:
KickicoCrowdsale.mintTokens has external calls inside a loop:
	- tokenReward.mintToken(recipients[i],oldTokenReward.balanceOf(recipients[i]),1538902800) (/unique_chucks/2/0x3aa5fa4fbf18d19548680a5f2bba061b18fed26b.sol#287-290)

Reentrancy in KickicoCrowdsale.KickicoCrowdsale (/unique_chucks/2/0x3aa5fa4fbf18d19548680a5f2bba061b18fed26b.sol#113-134):
	External calls:
	- tokenMultiplier = tokenMultiplier ** tokenReward.decimals() (/unique_chucks/2/0x3aa5fa4fbf18d19548680a5f2bba061b18fed26b.sol#121-124)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- advisory (/unique_chucks/2/0x3aa5fa4fbf18d19548680a5f2bba061b18fed26b.sol#126-129)
	- angelInvestors (/unique_chucks/2/0x3aa5fa4fbf18d19548680a5f2bba061b18fed26b.sol#130-132)

	- prPool (/unique_chucks/2/0x3aa5fa4fbf18d19548680a5f2bba061b18fed26b.sol#125)
